begin.passage: Walking down the path, you notice something on the ground!

get_item.passage: With the item in hand, you have no problem passing through the magical barrier.

no_item.passage: Choosing not to take the item, you are stuck when a magic barrier blocks your path.

overcome_no_item.passage: Using nothing but your wits you pass through the barrier.  You see someone in the path before you.

no_overcome.passage: Unable to pass through the barrier, you find your journey meeting an early end

overcome_item.passage: On the path before you, you see someone.

greet_no_item.passage: Greeting the man you listen to his words of wisdom.  Soon you find yourself at your destination.

options.no_item_end: Without the item you are lost
options.wise_enter: Remembering the wise words you enter

no_meet.passage: Ignoring the person, you press on towards your destination.

meet_item.passage: Greeting the character, you show him your item.  He explains its use to you.  Soon you reach your destination.

options.item_enter: Use the item to get in

wise_enter.passage: Finally your journey is at an end, as all is revealed.

no_item_end.passage: Despite everything, you cannot enter.  You came so far for nothing.

no_try.passage: Though you travelled far, you know the destination isn't as important as the journey.  Sitting down, you don't enter.

item_enter.passage: Using the item, and the wise words of the stranger, you enter your final destination where you can live.
